space.world

Class Bullet

  • java.lang.Object
    • space.world.Entity
      • space.world.NonStationary
        • space.world.Bullet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewableNonStationary, ViewableObject

    public class Bullet
extends NonStationary
    Represents a Bullet. If it collides with a player in the room, it teleports the player back to a specified place.
